Package de.jhh4.logic

Class IslandMaker

java.lang.Object
de.jhh4.logic.IslandMaker
public class IslandMaker extends Object
this class makes terrain grids as a basis for map creation the first dimension represents the rows the second dimension represents the columns meaning: Tile[y][x]

  • Method Details

    • createRandomIsland

      public Tile[][] createRandomIsland(int width, int height)
      this method can be called to create a balanced map with the specified dimensions works with the attributes mainWindow and island
      Parameters:
      width - of the map
      height - of the map
      Returns:
      the array which defines the terrain of the map

    • createOceanBorder

      private void createOceanBorder()
      sets all outer tiles of the map as Ocean tiles

    • createRandomInternalTiles

      private void createRandomInternalTiles()
      sets all inner tiles of the map to either Ocean, Mountain, Forest, or Plains tiles. Plains and Forest are twice as likely to appear to make the terrain more traversable. the center tile is guaranteed to be a Plains tile to enable settler/city spawning.

    • getIsland

      public static Tile[][] getIsland()
      Returns:
      the island
